document.bingtitle: Top 10 Ten Best Burgers in Los Angeles The Counter Gayot
document.webtitle: Best - Top 10 Burgers in Los Angeles The Counter Gayot
document.description: Taking the “have it your way” mantra to the extreme, The Counter creates a safe haven for even the pickiest eater, while managing to serve up great food fast.
document.body: Search Site Since 1969, restaurant, hotel, travel&other witty reviews by a handpicked, worldwide team of discerning professionals—and your views, too.
